allow:
Bash(# Move CSS
mv styles.css src/css/

# Move JavaScript files to src/js/
mv asset_loading.js src/js/
mv main.js src/js/
mv state.js src/js/
mv viewer_fbx.js src/js/
mv ui.js src/js/ui/
mv tree_folder_view.js src/js/ui/

# Move handlers
mv handlers/*.js src/js/handlers/

# Move workers
mv folder_scanner_worker.js src/js/workers/

# Move utils (they''re already in utils folder)
mv utils/*.js src/js/utils/

# Move shared
mv shared/filters.js src/js/utils/

# Move graphics
mv GFX/*.svg src/assets/gfx/

# Move server and scripts
mv server.js scripts/
mv create_zip.py scripts/)
